member.name: T:Randomization.RandomCharsAndStrings
member.summary: Provides static methods for generating random characters and strings of different length

member.name: M:Randomization.RandomCharsAndStrings.RandomLowercaseLetter
member.summary: Get a randomly generated lowercase character type

member.name: M:Randomization.RandomCharsAndStrings.RandomUppercaseLetter
member.summary: Get a randomly generated uppercase character type

member.name: M:Randomization.RandomCharsAndStrings.RandomLetterString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a randomly generated string consisting of letters a-z, A-Z

member.name: M:Randomization.RandomCharsAndStrings.RandomAlphanumericString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a randomly generated string consisting of numbers 0-9 and letters a-z, A-Z
member.returns: Randomly generated string of letters and numbers

member.name: T:Randomization.RandomColors
member.summary: Provides static methods for generating random colors

member.name: M:Randomization.RandomColors.RandomColor
member.summary: Get a randomly generated color from the standard spectrum
member.returns: One out of approximately 16 million colors on the RGB spectrum
